p.s: The following text will be about an 18-year-old German volunteer, named Bianca, who worked in an Education Center for children in a slum of Delhi, India.
She tells about her usual routine in which she starts to educate firstly the boys in English grammar and later on the girls.
In the text Bianca points out huge amount of love and acceptance the children have towards her and in general.
She compares her volunteer experience back to her hometown children where she makes clear again that the children in India are so generous about every little thing.
She informesinforms that even though they sometimes were sad or frustrated they had most of the time much fun, laughed at lot.
All in all Bianca discribesdescribes her volunteering as the best decision and experience of her life which she is very thankful for.
